analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na sekkham dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ sekkhaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe āsevane tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na asekkham dhammam paccayā abyākataḥ asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo
analyzed: na kusalam na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca
